abstract: Pursuing its $167 billion takeover of Rio Tinto Group, BHP Billiton has made a submission to the Australian competition regulator seeking approval for the hostile bid, Bloomberg reported.
lead_paragraph: Pursuing its $167 billion takeover of Rio Tinto Group, BHP Billiton has made a submission to the Australian competition regulator seeking approval for the hostile bid, Bloomberg reported.

headline.main: BHP Asks Australian Regulator for Rio Tinto Approval
